org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice

Class ControlPanelCollection

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.alljoyn.ioe.controlpanelservice.ControlPanelCollection

  • public class ControlPanelCollection
extends java.lang.Object
    ControlPanelCollection represents a family of the DeviceControlPanel objects per language that belong to the same functional Unit

    • Constructor Detail

      • ControlPanelCollection

        public ControlPanelCollection(ControllableDevice controllableDevice,
                      Unit unit,
                      java.lang.String collName,
                      java.lang.String objPath)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        controllableDevice - The ControllableDevice the collection belongs to
        unit - The Unit the collection belongs to
        collName - The name of the control panel collection
        objPath - The object path to introspect the control panel collection

        Returns:
        The functional Unit the collection belongs to

        public java.lang.String getObjectPath()
        Returns:
        The ControlPanelCollection object path

      • getControlPanelVersion

        public java.lang.Short getControlPanelVersion()
        Returns:
        The version of the ControlPanel interface, NULL if failed to be set

      • getNotificationActionVersion

        public java.lang.Short getNotificationActionVersion()
        Returns:
        The version of the NotificationAction interface, may be NULL if failed to be set, or the objectPath doesn't implement the NotificationAction interface

      • getControlPanels

        public java.util.Collection<DeviceControlPanel> getControlPanels()
        Returns:
        Collection of DeviceControlPanel

      • getLanguages

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getLanguages()
        Returns:
        A set of languages of the control panels of this collection

        Cleans the object resources
